### Load the data

Checking if the data folder is there and if not, creates it and writes the loaded data file.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

# unzip the file to data folder
zip_file <- "../_raw/kidney_disease.zip"

# if ../data/ is not present in root, create it
if (!dir.exists("../data")) {
  dir.create("../data")
} 
else {
  message("Folder exists.")
}


# unzip the data into ../data
unzip(zip_file, exdir = "../data")

data_dir <- "../data"

if( !dir.exists(data_dir) ){
  dir.create(path = data_dir)
}


kidney_disease <- "../_raw/kidney_disease.csv" |> 
  read_csv() |>
  write_csv("../data/01_data_load.csv")
```
